thread.title: Elaine Crowley Sparkles At Cllr Teresa Costello's Wedding
thread.title_full: Elaine Crowley Sparkles At Cllr Teresa Costello's Wedding

author: Rebecca Dore
title: Elaine Crowley Sparkles At Cllr Teresa Costello's Wedding
text:
Elaine Crowley was a picture of pure happiness as her friend Dublin local councillor Teresa Costello said 'I do'.
The broadcaster was right by the Tallaght councilwoman's side as she tied the knot in serious style.
Today's top videos
There were smiles all around as Teresa, who is a breast cancer survivor, got ready for her trip down the aisle on the morning of her wedding with her bride tribe and the matching purple dressing gowns were out.
Elaine Crowley with Teresa Costello on her wedding day. Pic: Supplied Elaine dazzled in a mint green dress which was awash with twinkling sequins.
She wore her hair in gentle waves with dark smokey eyeshadow which complemented her eyes beautifully and she also wore light pink lippy.
Pic: Supplied The bride opted for a glamorous strapless gown with a tulle skirt that had a dainty bow waistband for her big day and she accessorised with a glittering necklace and drop earrings.
Wearing her hair up with curled bangs, the bride chose a dewy makeup look with statement smokey eyes and pink lipstick.
Pic: Supplied The Dublin mum was diagnosed with stage three breast cancer at the age of 36 .
Her world was rocked by the prognosis and she then underwent chemotherapy and a mastectomy followed by immediate reconstruction and radiotherapy.
Pic: Supplied Teresa is a Breast Cancer Ireland ambassador who has been helping women all around Ireland navigate their journey with the disease through her online support group Breast Friends .
